verses.verse: Then all the captains<WH8269> of the forces,<WH2428> and Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah,<WH7143> and Jezaniah<WH3153> the son<WH1121> of Hoshaiah,<WH1955> and all the people<WH5971> from the least<WH6996> even to the greatest,<WH1419> came near,<WH5066>

and said<WH559> to Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet,<WH5030> Please let our supplication<WH8467> be presented<WH5307> before<WH6440> you,<WH6419> and pray for us to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> even for all this remnant;<WH7611> for we are left<WH7604> but a few<WH4592> of many,<WH7235> as your eyes<WH5869> do see us:<WH7200>
that Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> may show<WH5046> us the way<WH1870> in which we should walk,<WH3212> and the thing<WH1697> that we should do.<WH6213>

Then Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> said<WH559> to them,<WH8085> I have heard you;<WH6419> behold, I will pray to Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> according to your words;<WH1697> and it shall happen that whatever thing<WH1697> Yahweh<WH3068> shall answer<WH6030> you,<WH5046> I will declare it to you;<WH4513> I will keep nothing<WH1697> back from you.<WH4513>

Then they said<WH559> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> Yahweh<WH3068> be a true<WH571> and faithful<WH539> witness<WH5707> among us,<WH6213> if we don't do according to all the word<WH1697> with which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall send you to us.<WH7971>

Whether it be good,<WH2896> or whether it be evil,<WH7451> we will obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> to whom we<WH580> send<WH7971> you;<WH3190> that it may be well with us,<WH8085> when we obey the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> our God.<WH430>
It happened after<WH7093> ten<WH6235> days,<WH3117> that the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Jeremiah.<WH3414>

Then called<WH7121> he Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah,<WH7143> and all the captains<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428> who were with him,<WH5971> and all the people from the least<WH6996> even to the greatest,<WH1419>
and said<WH559> to them,<WH559> Thus says Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to whom you sent<WH7971> me to present<WH5307> your supplication<WH8467> before him:<WH6440>

If you will still<WH7725> live<WH3427> in this land,<WH776> then will I build<WH1129> you,<WH2040> and not pull you down, and I will plant<WH5193> you,<WH5428> and not pluck you up; for I grieve<WH5162> over the distress<WH7451> that I have brought on you.<WH6213>

Don't<WH3372> be afraid of<WH6440> the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> of whom<WH6440> you are afraid;<WH3373> don't<WH3372> be afraid of him,<WH5002> says Yahweh:<WH3068> for I am with you to save<WH3467> you,<WH5337> and to deliver you from his hand.<WH3027>
I will grant<WH5414> you mercy,<WH7356> that he may have mercy<WH7355> on you,<WH7725> and cause you to return to your own land.<WH127>
But if you say,<WH559> We will not dwell<WH3427> in this land;<WH776> so that you don't<WH8085> obey the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430>

saying,<WH559> No;<WH935> but we will go into the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> where we shall see<WH7200> no war,<WH4421> nor hear<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> nor have hunger<WH7456> of bread;<WH3899> and there will we dwell:<WH3427>

now therefore hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> O remnant<WH7611> of Judah:<WH3063> Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> If you indeed<WH7760> set<WH7760> your faces<WH6440> to enter<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> and go<WH935> to live there;<WH1481>

then it shall happen,<WH2719> that the sword, which you fear,<WH3373> shall overtake<WH5381> you there in the land<WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714> and the famine,<WH7458> about which you are afraid,<WH1672> shall follow close<WH1692> behind<WH310> you there in Egypt;<WH4714> and there you shall die.<WH4191>

So shall it be with all the men<WH582> who set<WH7760> their faces<WH6440> to go<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714> to live<WH1481> there:<WH4191> they shall die by the sword,<WH2719> by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence;<WH1698> and none of them shall remain<WH8300> or escape<WH6412> from<WH6440> the evil<WH7451> that I will bring on them.<WH935>

For thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> As my anger<WH639> and my wrath<WH2534> has been poured forth<WH5413> on the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> so shall my wrath<WH2534> be poured forth<WH5413> on you,<WH935> when you shall enter into Egypt;<WH4714> and you shall be an object<WH423> of horror,<WH8047> and an astonishment, and a curse,<WH7045> and a reproach;<WH2781> and you shall see<WH7200> this place no more.<WH4725>

Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken<WH1696> concerning you,<WH7611> remnant of Judah,<WH3063> Don't<WH935> you go into Egypt:<WH4714> know<WH3045> certainly<WH3045> that I have testified<WH5749> to you this day.<WH3117>

For you have dealt deceitfully<WH8582> against your own souls;<WH5315> for you sent<WH7971> me to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> saying,<WH559> Pray<WH6419> for us to Yahweh<WH3068> our God;<WH430> and according to all that Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall say,<WH559> so declare<WH5046> to us,<WH6213> and we will do it:
and I have this day<WH3117> declared<WH5046> it to you;<WH8085> but you have not obeyed the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> in anything for which he has sent me to you.<WH7971>

Now therefore know<WH3045> certainly<WH3045> that you shall die<WH4191> by the sword,<WH2719> by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence,<WH1698> in the place<WH4725> where you desire<WH2654> to go<WH935> to live there.<WH1481>
